metadata.synopsis: A guard orc standing at Danthelon's Dancing Axe entrance welcomes visitors of the shop
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A, walk into Danthelon's Dancing Axe atlarian://bookmark?name=BGO_DanthelonDancingAxe&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=0.709298;50.450680;129.280289&camTarget=-0.058590;50.180027;129.860886

0.speaker: Somi
0.text: Welcome to Danthelon's Dancing Axe. Our stock isn't 'used' - it's tried and tested by the finest adventurers.
0.context: NodeContext: Repeating the same old slogan you're forced to greet every customer with - not particularly enthused.
